intension: Create a real estate flyer to showcase a beautiful property with a pool. The flyer should include the real estate agency name, address, phone number, and email address. The text should emphasize the attractiveness of the property and the affordable starting price of $60,000.
globalcaption: The image features a large, white house with a swimming pool in the backyard. The house is surrounded by a lush green garden, adding to its charm. The pool is situated in the middle of the backyard, making it a focal point of the property.\n\nIn the front of the house, there is a balcony with a few potted plants, providing a pleasant view of the pool and the garden. The overall atmosphere of the scene is inviting and relaxing, making it an ideal place to call home.
keywords: flyer, leaflet, promotion, tb, property, house, home, estate, sale, mortgage, realtor, purchase, housing, residential, real estate, blue, pool, illustration

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a blue background with a yellow arrow pointing downwards. The arrow is positioned towards the right side of the image, and it appears to be the main focus of the scene

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a large, white house with a swimming pool situated in the backyard. The pool is filled with water and surrounded by a lush green lawn. There are several chairs placed around the pool area, providing a comfortable spot for relaxation. \n\nIn addition to the pool, there is a balcony on the house with a few potted plants placed on it, adding a touch of greenery to the scene. The overall atmosphere of the image is inviting and serene, perfect for a day spent outdoors
